tha-ap95:1.3: Paramakāpaññapattomhi → paramakāruññapattomhi (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); parakāpaññapattomhi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap95:4.1: Ekūnapaññāsakappamhi → ekūnapaṇṇekappamhi (bj); ekapaññāsakappamhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); ekūnapaṇṇe kappamhi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap95:4.4: bāttiṁsāsuṁ → battiṁsāsuṁ (bj); khattiyāsuṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); battiṁsāsu (pts-vp-pli1)
